snippet: With support especially from younger voters, Basuki Tjahaja Purnama has shaken the establishment by vowing to run as an independent when he seeks to keep his office next year.
abstract: Gov Basuki Tjahaja Purnama of Jakarta announces plans to run as political independent in February 2017 elections, rejecting major political party Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle; Purnama's stated goal is to separate himself from powerful national parties that have emerged during Indonesia’s transition to democracy.
lead_paragraph: With support especially from younger voters, Basuki Tjahaja Purnama has shaken the establishment by vowing to run as an independent when he seeks to keep his office next year.

headline.main: Governor of Jakarta Bucks Indonesia’s Party Politics
headline.print_headline: Independent Run by Jakarta Governor Upends Indonesia’s Party Politics
